name: TMM_Pong
description:
a pong game i created from scratch using unity. features compiled binaries for:

- macos;

- linux;

- windows;

- webgl;

- facebook wegbl;

still some bugs with webgl, namely background video includes. this will be fixed later on. accomplished within one day and a half of work, without never getting bad serious about unity

source code available @: https://github.com/tmm2018/TMM_Pong
